info.name: ZeresPluginLibrary
info.description: Gives other plugins utility functions and the ability to emulate v2.

changelog.title: Improvements
items: **Internal changes** to stop using all BD globals outside of `BdApi`.
**jQuery** now no longer used in the library--not that there was much anyways.
Added some new options to the Slider setting to make it customizable
There were also some various performance improvements.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: `ReactComponents` had some bugs with how it stored and searched components, this has been fixed.
There was a bug where the library reloaded the wrong plugins, it shouldn't do that anymore.
